code: var getShortDate=function getShortDate(dt){var months=["Jan","Feb","Mar","Apr","May","Jun","Jul","Aug","Sep","Oct","Nov","Dec"];return months[dt.getMonth()]+" "+dt.getDate()+", "+dt.getFullYear();};var getShortTime=function getShortTime(dt){var hours=dt.getHours();var minutes=dt.getMinutes();var timePart=hours<12?"am":"pm";if(hours<1)hours=12;return"".concat(hours>12?hours-12:hours,":").concat(minutes.toString().padStart(2,'0')," ").concat(timePart);};export{getShortDate,getShortTime};
